Answer one question. Refer closely to the novel you have selected to study, a copy of which may be
brought into the examination.

1.   From a novel you have chosen to study, select a passage where there is a power struggle
     between opposing characters. Outline how you would stage the scene for an audience in
     order to convey the conflict in a dramatically interesting manner.


2.   From a novel you have chosen to study, select a passage where the subject is the death of a
     character or characters. Outline how you would establish the mood of the scene and how you
     would stage it to convey the importance of the event to an audience.


3.   From a novel you have chosen to study, select a passage which conveys a sense of intrigue.
     Outline how, by staging and action, you might present this scene and its significance to an
     audience.
